context: We're born again, not of corruptible seed, but of incorruptible by the word of God, which liveth and abideth forever, according to what Peter tells us.
we are kept by the power of God
I am kept by the power of God according to 1 Peter chapter 1.

notice in 1 Peter chapter number 4, the Bible speaks about this truth of ministering and having received this gift... Notice in verse number 10 of 1 Peter 4, as every man hath received the gift, even so
